io::CommandLineParser Class Reference
[Input/output library]

#include <CommandLineParser.h>

List of all members.

Detailed Description

Parses main() command line arguments.

Speculative interface which allows 'try to read option' style usage so you can try to get some command line option and if the query fails you can ask it with prompt.

bool io::CommandLineParser::getInt (  const char *  name,
int *  value
)  const
 

Parses integer option.

For example when command line has "-maxcount 3" you can say int x; getInt("-maxcount",&x) and x will contain number 3.

Returns:
true if query succeeds.

bool io::CommandLineParser::getString (  const char *  name,
lang::String *  str
)  const
 

Parses integer option.

For example when command line has "-maxcount mystr" you can say String x; getInt("-maxcount",&x) and x will contain "mystr".

Returns:
true if query succeeds.

Returns true if specified option exists.
